description: Comprehensive undergraduate programs designed to build strong foundations

degrees.name: Software Engineering
degrees.description: Learn to design, develop, and maintain software systems. Covers programming languages, algorithms, data structures, software engineering principles, and modern development practices.

degrees.name: Medicine
degrees.description: Comprehensive medical education covering anatomy, physiology, pharmacology, clinical practice, and patient care. Prepares students for medical licensure and residency programs.

degrees.name: Business Management
degrees.description: Develop leadership and management skills for business environments. Covers organizational behavior, finance, marketing, operations, and strategic planning.

degrees.name: Information Technology
degrees.description: Comprehensive IT education covering networks, cybersecurity, databases, systems administration, and emerging technologies like cloud computing and AI.

description: Advanced graduate programs for specialized knowledge and expertise

degrees.name: Computer Science
degrees.description: Advanced study in algorithms, artificial intelligence, machine learning, software systems, and research methodologies. Prepares for PhD programs or senior technical roles.

degrees.name: Business Administration (MBA)
degrees.description: Executive-level business education covering strategic management, leadership, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship. Designed for career advancement in business.

degrees.name: Data Science
degrees.description: Advanced analytics and machine learning education. Covers statistical methods, big data technologies, predictive modeling, and data visualization.

degrees.name: Public Health
degrees.description: Comprehensive study of population health, epidemiology, health policy, and community health interventions. Prepares for leadership in public health organizations.

description: Research and professional development programs for career advancement

degrees.name: PhD in Computer Science
degrees.description: Original research in computer science. Students conduct independent research, publish papers, and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in their field.

degrees.name: PhD in Business
degrees.description: Advanced research in business disciplines. Focus on original contributions to business theory, empirical research, and academic scholarship.

degrees.name: PhD in Medicine
degrees.description: Advanced medical research and clinical training. Combines laboratory research, clinical trials, and specialized medical practice.

degrees.name: PhD in Engineering
degrees.description: Original research in engineering disciplines. Students develop innovative solutions, conduct experiments, and advance engineering knowledge.
